backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access control, storage mixin, and full chat backend including chatrooms, messages, reactions, profiles, and validation.

frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend paths to brief functional summaries for build planning.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router routes, 404 handling, header/footer layout, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for viewing, uploading, and removing user avatars with validation and async updates.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat view rendering messages, replies, pinned video, auto-scroll behavior, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnail handling for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter plus live status and metadata display.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL input including YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter preview logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection features.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a login prompt component.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, pinned video support, embedded media, and reply interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides the message input box with support for images, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter links, uploads, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows the pinned YouTube or Twitch video for a chatroom with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and sync to pause other audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity loading, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom, message, and user operations using the backend actor with local user metadata helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode themes, and mobile input tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Parses video and social URLs to extract IDs or slugs and generate thumbnails or embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page that loads a chatroom, increments its view count, handles loading and error states, and renders ChatArea once data is available.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page that lists chatrooms with search and category filters, handles loading and connection errors, and opens chatrooms or the create dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing a fix request to ensure lobby thumbnails display rounded corners by clipping media inside a rounded wrapper.
